value.title: Using artificial intelligence to generate 3D holograms in real-time
value.excerpt: Researchers have developed a way to produce holograms almost instantly. The deep learning-based method is so efficient, it could run on a smartphone, they say.

value.title: Nvidia’s GTC will feature deep learning cabal of LeCun, Hinton, and Bengio
value.excerpt: The deep learning trio helped to popularize the use of Nvidia’s graphics chips for machine learning. value.title: Neural network CLIP mirrors human brain neurons in image recognition

value.title: Algorithm helps artificial intelligence systems dodge “adversarial” inputs
value.excerpt: A deep-learning algorithm developed by MIT researchers is designed to help machines navigate in the real world, where imperfect or “adversarial” inputs may cause uncertainty.

value.title: Assessing regulatory fairness through machine learning
value.excerpt: Applying machine learning to a U.S. Environmental Protection Agency initiative reveals how key design elements determine what communities bear the burden of pollution. The approach could help ensure fairness and accountability in machine learning used by government regulators.

value.title: UPDATE 1-Online learning platform Coursera files for U.S. IPO
value.excerpt: Online education provider Coursera Inc on Friday filed for a stock market listing with U.S. regulators, revealing a surge in revenue from a boost to business due to the disruption caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.

value.title: Open machine learning and AI data can increase ship energy efficiency
value.excerpt: The Swedish ship operator Ventrafiken and the research project “Data-driven energy efficiency for ships” (D2E2F) have established a collaboration to collect open data for research purposes. One of the double ended ferries (Uraniborg) have been equipped with a Blueflow Energy Management System to collect data on energy consumers and vessel data.

value.title: TensorFlow 3D: Deep Learning for Autonomous Cars’ 3D Perception
value.excerpt: Google has released TensorFlow 3D, a library that adds 3D deep-learning capabilities to the TensorFlow machine-learning framework. The new library brings tools and resources that allow researchers to develop and deploy 3D scene understanding models.
